Posts.Content: As a 13 year survivor now 1 year mbc and currently NED, I am visiting with my doctor on next steps tomorrow. I have noticed that many of you are one week on one week off on Xeloda. Do you have any written info on this direction that I could share with my doctor whose protocol is two weeks on one week off? Seems that it has many benefits. Thank you for anything you can share
Posts.Title: Written info on one week on one week off with Xeloda

Posts.Content: Thanks for the info. At my visit they asked that I complete two more cycles and get the next scan before any changes. In the mean time they sent my case to a board to review to see if I should go off and wait and see if I continue to be NED. Have mixed emotions but it would feel good to feel 100% again.
Posts.Title: Written info on one week on one week off with Xeloda
